content.rendered:
Directed by Vivek Agnihotri.

Written by Priti Singh.

Cast Pulkit Samrat(Captain Jahan Bakshi). Yami Gautam(Suhani). Gulshan Devaiah(Yash). Hrishitaa Bhatt(Mishti). Poonam Kaur(Kamya (as S. Poonam Kaur)). Aneesha Joshi(Rangoli). Herry Tangiri(DMK (as Harry Tangri)). Khushboo Upadhyay(Preet). Sanjay Mehandiratta(Col. Bhatti). Charu Rohatgi(Mrs. Bhatti). Shakeel Khan(Harinder). Ravi Khemu(Suhani’s Father (as Ravi Kemmu)). Anoop Kamal Singh(Suhani’s uncle). Madhuri Bandiwdekar(Suhani’s Mother (as Madhuri D. Bandiwolkar)). Jaquiline Garewal(Suhani’s aunt). Taran Bajaj(Tullu (as Tarandeep Singh Bajaj)). Manoj Bakshi(Yash Father). Gurpreet Kaur(Yash’s Mother). Rakesh Thareja(Yash’s older brother). Harjeet Kaur(Yash’s grandma). Manann Dania(Honey). Garvil Bhatia(Prince). Sarabjeet Singh(Vancouver uncle). Maninder Singh(Harry). Gurinder Singh(Happy). Divya(Majhli bhabu). Honey(Chhoti bhabu). Ravneet Kaur(Young girl in wedding). Kawalnain Kaur(Kid in wedding). Amanpreet Kaur(Kid in wedding). Amandeep Kaur(Kid in wedding). Jasmeen Kaur(Kid in wedding). Khushi Sharma(Kid in wedding). Bharvneet(Kid in wedding). Ekmeet Singh(Kid in wedding). Balraaj Singh(Kid in wedding). Sahib Singh(Kid in wedding). Jaskaran Singh Gandhi(Kid in wedding (as Jaskaran Singh)). Prabhsimar Singh(Kid in wedding). Andy Singh(Andy, wedding manager). Ajaydeep Singh(Shandy, assistant wedding manager) . Pradip Khairwar(D.J operator). Vivek Bhatnagar(Botany Professor (uncredited)). Abhimanyu Kukreja(Ranjha (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Vivek Bhatnagar. Hanif Chunawala. Bhushan Kumar. Meenakshi Pandey. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Super Cassettes Industries Limited (T-Series).
